title: Ray-Ban Rb2180 Round Sunglasses
descriptions: Modern classics with an open-minded personality. Thanks to a simple and timeless design, 2180 represents one of the most popular and loved models at a global level. The RB2180 is an easy to wear roundish style that can easily be your companion to guide you through your casual daily routines. Available in a variety of classic colors and contemporary tones, with solid, mirrored, or gradient lenses. Ray-Ban sunglasses sold by authorized sellers, like Amazon, are eligible for all manufacturer warranties and guarantees. Click on the Ray-Ban link above the product title to shop the entire Ray-Ban sunglass and eyeglass assortment.
